call_title: Dev Update Oct. 28th 2024 |  Cyberverse, Paideia, MewFinance, Sigs Mining, Sigmaspace and more!

topics.title: Sigmanauts Mining Pool DAO Overview
topics.summary: Detailed introduction to the Sigmanauts Mining Pool DAO, highlighting its community-driven approach, storage rent implementation, and educational mission. The pool features around 76 gigahash, implements bonus payments, and aims to make mining pools more engaging like Cardano stake pools.

topics.title: Cross-Chain Mining Payment System Development
topics.summary: Mark the Shark is developing a system allowing miners to mine ERG but receive payments in other tokens like Rosen Bitcoin or ADA through NFT-based configuration. This enables mining proof-of-stake chains while contributing to Ergo's security.

topics.title: Kushti Protocol Development Updates
topics.summary: Protocol updates include polishing Sigma 6.0 PR, working on Sigma State Interpreter tests, sub-blocks input processing, testing 5.10 with database tweaks, and discussing LP contracts with Luca for Dexy.

topics.title: Paideia DAO Platform Beta Progress
topics.summary: Paideia fixes include handling null characters in PostgreSQL and off-chain transaction replay bugs. Live Paideia will bootstrap with zero rewards, and Sigmanauts will receive a free DAO for testing DAO creation functionality.

topics.title: Nautilus Wallet Zero-Conf and Updates
topics.summary: Nautilus 0.15 beta with zero-conf is released on abyss channel for testing. Version 14.2 released on stable channel, fixing XLP creation bugs and implementing Ledger Flex and Stacks support with chain transaction building in Fleet SDK.

topics.title: Keystone Hardware Wallet Integration
topics.summary: Development of Ergo integration into Keystone hardware wallet with address generation working and transaction signing in progress. The wallet may be available through MewMart in the future.

topics.title: SigmaSpace Explorer Performance Optimizations
topics.summary: SigmaSpace implemented query monitoring and database optimizations making mempool transactions instantly visible. The explorer maintains GraphQL compatibility with other Ergo explorers and is now integrated into new Nautilus installations.

topics.title: Token Flight Distribution Contract System
topics.summary: Token Flight system sends assets to proxy contracts for time-based distribution to users with various patterns including linear, quadratic, exponential, and logarithmic. Testing on testnet for Sigmanauts mining pool bonus rewards and ErgoHack 9 integration.

topics.title: Cyberverse Rocket Rush Mini-Game Launch
topics.summary: Cyberverse launched Rocket Rush, a multiplayer mini-game with competitive flying mechanics, power-ups, and point systems. Additional updates include chat improvements, music player enhancements, Halloween minting event, and increased emote selections.

topics.title: MewFinance Ecosystem Expansion Updates
topics.summary: MewFinance updates include CLB development with Richie, MewDex Cardano native bridging, MewMart verified collections following EIP standards, Keystone integration, and SNEK payment support. Emphasis on practical blockchain utility through community commerce.

topics.title: Rosen Bridge P2P Communication Upgrade
topics.summary: Rosenet implementation for improved guard peer-to-peer communication is in final testing phases. The upgrade aims to be more fault-tolerant, prevent stuck events, and scale to larger guard sets, requiring community participation in global decentralized testing.

topics.title: Liquidity Pool Development and Ecosystem Usage
topics.summary: Paul's raffle successfully raised over $2,200 for Rosen-ETH ERG liquidity pairs on Uniswap. Discussion of reaching out to mining pools for additional liquidity provision and emphasis on actively utilizing the ecosystem rather than just holding assets.
